name: Fidget Spinner: Smash It!
description: There is some kind of logic in this game and even some rules of playing with a spinner. It can be thrown and it will smash different objects. The 3D-spinner model in this game has physical properties, some of it have shifted center of mass, it all spin differently. Not a bad chip – there is a torsion sound, similar to the sound of rotating bearings. The object of the game is to break objects, gain points and new spinners.
